title: The title of hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", now it changes with settings.
OB: When opening the hyperlink builder, the title is not displayed as expected.
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options", but it is changing with the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Click on "OK" in the hyperlink builder.
2. Reopen the hyperlink builder.

Expected behavior: The title of the hyperlink builder should be "Hyperlink Options".
